name: Ambo: First Aid
description:
This is a two player game. The host drives an ambulance and the other player rides in the back and cares for the patient (play over LAN and place host's IP address into address field when playing as medic).

Controls for driver:

  • Arrow keys to control ambulance

Controls for medic:

  • WASD to move around, mouse to look
  • Click or space to interact

Objective is to keep Craig, a heart attack patient, alive for long enough to get to the hospital.
